Articles.Content:
this one can go to the **mun** its awsame and easy to use

i have a few space craft that are very good

1 can even get to the mun very easily (just remember to turn on the SAS)

any way

to download some of my crafts you will need these mods

NOVA PUNCH MOD PACK

C7 AND C7 HARD POINTS AND THE BETA (u only need these ones for my space planes)

DOWN UNDER MOD PACK

JAWRD

KW MOD PACK

RocktCo

and others 

i will leave in the description for each mod every map pack that was used in it

this first rocket will take u 2 the moon

it may be unstable at first but is easier after (just remember to turn the SAS on)

**Here is a video i made of it going to the moon** please check it out it took along long time to make

[https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!161&id=99F104C10E21B212%21161#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21162](https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!161&id=99F104C10E21B212%21161#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21162)

Hello and welcome to the forums !

Just a little Heads up to make your thread clearer: theres a 'modify' button on the right side of the posting window, so you can modify your original post to add everything you need without Quadruple posting, and also add multiple attachments, just beware of the overall size.

You could also add screenshots of your exploits with your craft too (in spoiler tags) !

thanx for the heads up

who ever u r
Hes.... THE BOSS, no HarvestR is
